constituent: praise, top hat, protect, person, dumbfounded, mouth, tree, wood, scarf
heisigStory: Top hat and scarf . . . protect. Note that the "tree" in protect becomes a wooden pole here.
koohiiStory1: Mr. T is praised for his protecting of the trees by being given a top hat and scarf which he wears over his mohawk and chains, respectively.
koohiiStory2: An old lady puts a top hat and scarf on her poodle and praises him for how cute he is. The dog thinks, "Someone protect me from this psycho!"...　RTK2:　ホウ　過褒　かほう(excessive praise).
